title: 摇滚乐我一点也不感兴趣 Leaves me cold

conversations.english: Rock music really leaves me cold. What about you?摇滚乐我一点也不感兴趣。你呢？
conversations.chinese: 摇滚乐我一点也不感兴趣。你呢？
conversations.reply_english: I'm crazy about it.It makes me very excited.我喜欢得着迷，它使我兴奋。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢得着迷，它使我兴奋。

title: 可恶的蚊子正在咬我 Sneaky little jerks

conversations.english: The mosquitos are biting me!蚊子正在咬我！
conversations.chinese: 蚊子正在咬我！
conversations.reply_english: Me, too, I can’t stop scratching. They are everywhere! Sneaky little jerks.蚊子也在咬我！我得不停地挠。到处都是蚊子。可恶的东西。
conversations.reply_chinese: 蚊子也在咬我！我得不停地挠。到处都是蚊子。可恶的东西。

title: 都是她让我们那么难堪 I don't care

conversations.english: Too much, Harry. Don't blame her anymore.够了，哈利，别再责怪她了。
conversations.chinese: 够了，哈利，别再责怪她了。
conversations.reply_english: But it was her that makes us so embarrassed.就是她让我们那么难堪。
conversations.reply_chinese: 就是她让我们那么难堪。

title: 她的无理迟早会让自己倒霉的 She's so rude

conversations.english: Did you hear what she said to me?你有没有听见她对我讲的话？
conversations.chinese: 你有没有听见她对我讲的话？
conversations.reply_english: I heard it.我听见了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听见了。

title: 这部电影这是烂片 It's a bomb

conversations.english: I don't like this movie. It's a bomb.我不喜欢这部电影。这是部烂片。
conversations.chinese: 我不喜欢这部电影。这是部烂片。
conversations.reply_english: Look, I've already paid for the tickets, so whether you like it or not we're going to finish watching it.哎，我已经付了票钱，所以不管你喜欢不喜欢，我们得看完它。
conversations.reply_chinese: 哎，我已经付了票钱，所以不管你喜欢不喜欢，我们得看完它。

title: 历史老师他总是没完没了地讲啊讲

conversations.english: Do you like our new history teacher?你喜欢新来的历史老师吗？
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢新来的历史老师吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm fed up with his endless talking.他没完没了地讲啊讲，我都听烦了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他没完没了地讲啊讲，我都听烦了。

title: 女主角的演技太做作了 Artificial

conversations.english: What a boring film!这个电影真没意思。
conversations.chinese: 这个电影真没意思。
conversations.reply_english: The acting of the heroine is too artificial.女主角的演技太做作了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 女主角的演技太做作了。

title: 那家伙的举止真招人讨厌

conversations.english: That guy's manner really turns me off.那家伙的举止真讨厌。
conversations.chinese: 那家伙的举止真讨厌。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.He never stops asking questions.谁说不是。他的问题没完没了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谁说不是。他的问题没完没了。

title: 堵车真是太烦人了 A bit of bind

conversations.english: Driving during the rush hours can be a bit of a bind.高峰期开车真叫人头疼。
conversations.chinese: 高峰期开车真叫人头疼。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.I think so.You have to be patient and careful.是啊，你得耐心、小心。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，你得耐心、小心。

title: 外面到底在吵些什么

conversations.english: What's all this noise about?都吵闹些什么呀？
conversations.chinese: 都吵闹些什么呀？
conversations.reply_english: They're discussing whether they should replace Miss Smith,the Music teacher.他们在讨论是否换掉音乐老师史密斯小姐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们在讨论是否换掉音乐老师史密斯小姐。

title: 她尖刻的态度真是太烦人了 Annoying

conversations.english: Is that pesky lady coming to the office again?那个讨厌的女人又来办公室啦？
conversations.chinese: 那个讨厌的女人又来办公室啦？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I'm afraid so.恐怕是的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 恐怕是的。

title: 我很讨厌跳舞 Be tired of dancing

conversations.english: I’m tired of dancing.我讨厌跳舞。
conversations.chinese: 我讨厌跳舞。
conversations.reply_english: But to me it's really enjoyable.但对我来说跳舞是一种享受。
conversations.reply_chinese: 但对我来说跳舞是一种享受。

title: 每天千篇一律的工作真让我觉得厌烦

conversations.english: All the routine work really browns me off.每天千篇一律的工作真让我讨厌。
conversations.chinese: 每天千篇一律的工作真让我讨厌。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,come on.You've just started.得了吧，你只不过刚刚开始
conversations.reply_chinese: 得了吧，你只不过刚刚开始

title: 她虽然漂亮但是太笨了 She is so stupid

conversations.english: She is so stupid.她太笨了。
conversations.chinese: 她太笨了。
conversations.reply_english: Who cares? She is pretty.谁管她笨不笨？她很漂亮。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谁管她笨不笨？她很漂亮。

title: 但我不太喜欢看电视

conversations.english: How do you feel about the TV series?你觉得那个电视系列剧怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 你觉得那个电视系列剧怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Oh,to be frank,I think it's sheer waste of time to watch it.说实话，我觉得看它纯粹是浪费时间。
conversations.reply_chinese: 说实话，我觉得看它纯粹是浪费时间。

title: 我觉得打网球没什么意思

conversations.english: Do you like playing tennis?你喜欢打网球吗？
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢打网球吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don't find it very exciting.我觉得没什么意思。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得没什么意思。

title: 我不喜欢跳舞 Be tired of dancing

conversations.english: I'm tired of dancing.我讨厌跳舞。
conversations.chinese: 我讨厌跳舞。
conversations.reply_english: But to me it's really enjoyable.但对我来说跳舞是一种享受。
conversations.reply_chinese: 但对我来说跳舞是一种享受。

title: 我觉得我永远也不会喜欢数学的

conversations.english: I must admit I'm not at all interested in math.我必须承认我对数学一点也不感兴趣。
conversations.chinese: 我必须承认我对数学一点也不感兴趣。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sure you'll soon begin to like it.It's such an interesting subject.我肯定你很快会喜欢它的,它是一门非常有趣的学科。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我肯定你很快会喜欢它的,它是一门非常有趣的学科。

title: 你怎么又学我 跟屁虫 Copycat

conversations.english: Are you ready to go to the mall?你准备要去购物中心了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你准备要去购物中心了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. Dig my new pants?嗯，你觉得我的新裤子如何？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，你觉得我的新裤子如何？

title: 多嘴的同事让人讨厌

conversations.english: How do you get along with your co-workers?你和同事的关系如何?
conversations.chinese: 你和同事的关系如何?
conversations.reply_english: I get along pretty well with most of them.It seems there are always a few rotten apples in the bunch,though,Like Margaret.I don't know why management hasn't fired her yet．She's a terrible gossip.我和他们大部分人处得都很不错。不过，好像一群人中总会有些坏家伙，比方说玛格丽特。我不知道管理部门为什么到现在还没有解雇她。她可是令人厌恶的饶舌者。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我和他们大部分人处得都很不错。不过，好像一群人中总会有些坏家伙，比方说玛格丽特。我不知道管理部门为什么到现在还没有解雇她。她可是令人厌恶的饶舌者。

title: 你真是个讨厌鬼 You're a creep

conversations.english: Hi, Dave. This is Zina.嗨，戴夫。我是吉娜。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，戴夫。我是吉娜。
conversations.reply_english: Zina? Zina the Snake?吉娜？诈包吉娜？
conversations.reply_chinese: 吉娜？诈包吉娜？

title: 比恩超无聊还很讨人厌 Obnoxious

conversations.english: You know that this afternoon's meeting is cancelled, right?你知道今天下午的会议取消了吧？
conversations.chinese: 你知道今天下午的会议取消了吧？
conversations.reply_english: Why am I always the last to know these things?为什么我总是最后一个知道这些事情的人？
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么我总是最后一个知道这些事情的人？

title: 我对那种秘书工作根本不感兴趣

conversations.english: What do you think of being a secretary?当秘书怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 当秘书怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not at all keen on that sort of job.It makes me crazy.我根本不喜欢那种工作，它简直使我发疯。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我根本不喜欢那种工作，它简直使我发疯。

title: 我最讨厌等公交车了

conversations.english: I'm really sick of waiting for a bus.等公共汽车真是太讨厌了。
conversations.chinese: 等公共汽车真是太讨厌了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.Especially when you have something urgent to do.是啊，尤其是你有急时候。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，尤其是你有急时候。

title: 为什么每天回家都要爬好几层楼梯

conversations.english: What a bother having to climb storeys home every day.每天都得爬好几层楼才能到家，真讨厌！
conversations.chinese: 每天都得爬好几层楼才能到家，真讨厌！
conversations.reply_english: But it's also a sort of exercise and it's good to your health.但这也是一种锻炼，对身体有好处。
conversations.reply_chinese: 但这也是一种锻炼，对身体有好处。

title: 我觉得养猫很脏

conversations.english: Do you keep any pets,such as cats,dogs?你养宠物吗，猫狗之类的？
conversations.chinese: 你养宠物吗，猫狗之类的？
conversations.reply_english: No,I'm scared of cats.不养，我怕猫。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不养，我怕猫。

title: 比恩真是个烂人 What a creep

conversations.english: Did Bean send these dirty jokes to you, too? Look!炳也有寄这些黄色笑话给你吗？妳看！
conversations.chinese: 炳也有寄这些黄色笑话给你吗？妳看！
conversations.reply_english: What a creep! Phony good luck e-mails are one thing, but sexual harassment is crossing the line.真是个烂人！骗人的幸运信是一回事，但性骚扰就太过分了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是个烂人！骗人的幸运信是一回事，但性骚扰就太过分了。

title: 你知道我天生爱吃甜食讨厌胡萝卜

conversations.english: Yuck. The carrots taste awful and salty. Hi sis, how do you like them?妈呀。这些胡萝卜又难吃又咸。姐姐，你觉得怎样？
conversations.chinese: 妈呀。这些胡萝卜又难吃又咸。姐姐，你觉得怎样？
conversations.reply_english: I like them very much. They are delicious.我很喜欢。它们很好吃。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很喜欢。它们很好吃。

title: 你看他那自视甚高的样子 Think high of

conversations.english: Do you think what I did to Elvin was out of line?你觉得我对艾文太过火了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你觉得我对艾文太过火了吗？
conversations.reply_english: You could have tried to explain to him about the new programmers.你本可以试着跟他解释，会有新的程序设计师进来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你本可以试着跟他解释，会有新的程序设计师进来。

title: 她太坏了 She's just evil

conversations.english: Just remember. The main thing right now is to make sure Stars.com is happy.切记一件事。目前的要务是确保Stars.com高兴。
conversations.chinese: 切记一件事。目前的要务是确保Stars.com高兴。
conversations.reply_english: Right. You're right. But she's just evil. Someone should drive a stake through her heart.对，你说得对。不过她真是邪恶到家。真该有人让她木桩穿心的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，你说得对。不过她真是邪恶到家。真该有人让她木桩穿心的。

title: 她讨厌起来还真要人命

conversations.english: Wow. She can be really nasty, can't she?哇。她讨厌起来还真要命，不是吗？
conversations.chinese: 哇。她讨厌起来还真要命，不是吗？
conversations.reply_english: No. She was right. I was too nervous. I kept thinking, What if we blow it?不。她说得对。我太紧张了。我满脑子都在想万一我们搞砸了怎么办?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不。她说得对。我太紧张了。我满脑子都在想万一我们搞砸了怎么办?
